deleteAccount.title: Account Deletion Request
deleteAccount.p1: If you wish to delete your Spark Keeper account and associated data, please follow these steps:
deleteAccount.step1: Send an email to support@sparkkeeper.com from the email address associated with your account
deleteAccount.step2: Include "Account Deletion Request" in the subject line
deleteAccount.step3: In the email body, confirm that you want to permanently delete your account and all associated data
deleteAccount.p2: You will receive a confirmation email within 48 hours. Your account and data will be permanently deleted within 30 days of confirmation.
